name: Big Potatoes
description: Fresh farm-grown big potatoes, perfect for everyday cooking and baking.
detailedDescription: These Big Potatoes are hand-picked from local farms, rich in carbohydrates and potassium. Ideal for boiling, mashing, baking, or frying. Store in a cool, dry place. Great for daily cooking and large family meals.

name: Chinese Cabbage
description: Crisp and fresh Chinese cabbage with rich nutrients.
detailedDescription: Our Chinese Cabbage is fresh, crisp, and full of vitamins. Perfect for stir-fry, salads, soups, and side dishes. Naturally grown and rich in Vitamin C and fiber. Keep refrigerated for best freshness.

additional_information.nutrition: Rich source of Vitamin C and fiber.

name: Ladies Finger
description: Fresh ladies finger, perfect for curries and stir fry.
detailedDescription: Tender and fresh Ladies Finger (Okra) suitable for curries, soups, and stir-fries. Packed with fiber, Vitamin C, and folate. Ideal for healthy cooking and vegetarian dishes. Store in a cool, dry place.

additional_information.nutrition: High in dietary fiber and Vitamin C.

name: Eggplant
description: Fresh eggplants rich in antioxidants and perfect for multiple cuisines.
detailedDescription: Fresh Eggplants rich in antioxidants. Ideal for grilling, baking, roasting, or making classic dishes like moussaka or ratatouille. Supports heart health and adds rich flavor to meals. Store in a cool, dry place.

additional_information.nutrition: Contains fiber, antioxidants, and Vitamin B1.

name: Fresh Cauliflower
description: Farm fresh cauliflower full of nutrients and flavor.
detailedDescription: Crisp and fresh Cauliflower, high in Vitamin C and antioxidants. Perfect for roasting, steaming, or adding to soups and curries. Supports healthy digestion and immunity. Best kept refrigerated.

additional_information.nutrition: High in Vitamin C and antioxidants.

name: Green Apple
description: Crisp and tangy green apples, rich in fiber and Vitamin C.
detailedDescription: Fresh and crisp Green Apples, perfect as a snack or in salads. Rich in dietary fiber and Vitamin C. Naturally sweet and tangy. Helps with digestion and immunity. Keep in a cool, dry place.

additional_information.nutrition: A good source of dietary fiber and Vitamin C.

name: Green Capsicum
description: Fresh green capsicum ideal for cooking and salads.
detailedDescription: Fresh Green Capsicum, crunchy and full of flavor. Perfect for stir-fries, salads, or stuffing. Rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants. Adds vibrant color and nutrition to any dish.

additional_information.nutrition: Rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants.

name: Green Chili
description: Hot and spicy green chilies for flavoring dishes.
detailedDescription: Fresh Green Chilies with a spicy kick, perfect for curries, sauces, and marinades. High in Vitamin C and capsaicin. Adds heat and flavor naturally to dishes. Store in a cool, dry place.

additional_information.nutrition: High in Vitamin C and capsaicin.

name: Green Cucumber
description: Fresh cucumbers with high water content and cooling effect.
detailedDescription: Crisp Green Cucumbers, hydrating and refreshing. Ideal for salads, sandwiches, and detox waters. Rich in Vitamin K and antioxidants. Store in the fridge for maximum freshness.

additional_information.nutrition: Hydrating vegetable, rich in Vitamin K.

name: Green Lettuce
description: Fresh crispy lettuce leaves perfect for salads and wraps.
detailedDescription: Fresh Green Lettuce, crisp and mild. Ideal for salads, sandwiches, and wraps. Low in calories and rich in Vitamin A. Keep refrigerated and rinse before use for maximum freshness.

additional_information.nutrition: Low in calories and rich in Vitamin A.

name: Ladies Finger
description: Tender and fresh okra pods, great for curries and stir-fry.
detailedDescription: Fresh and tender Ladies Finger (Okra) pods. Perfect for curries, stews, and stir-fry dishes. High in fiber, Vitamin C, and folate. Supports digestive health and immunity. Store in a cool place.

additional_information.nutrition: Good source of fiber, Vitamin C, and folate.

name: Red Capsicum
description: Bright red capsicum full of flavor and nutrition.
detailedDescription: Fresh Red Capsicum, sweet and crunchy. Ideal for stir-fries, salads, and roasting. Rich in Vitamin C, beta-carotene, and antioxidants. Adds color and nutrition to every meal.

additional_information.nutrition: High in Vitamin C and beta-carotene.
